name: spreadsheetAddRow
syntax: spreadsheetAddRow(spreadsheetObj, data [, row] [, column] [, insert] [, datatype])
description: Adds a row to an Excel spreadsheet object.

params.name: data
params.description: A comma separated list of cell values.

params.name: row
params.description: Row number at which to insert, if omitted appended.

params.name: column
params.description: Column number at which to insert data.

params.name: insert
params.description: When true appends data to spreadsheetObj, when false attempts to update rows.

params.name: datatype
params.description: CF11+ List of datatype expressions with values such as `STRING` `NUMERIC` or `DATE`. For example use `DATE:1;NUMERIC:2-2;STRING

examples.title: Add a row to SpreadSheet
examples.code:
<!--- Make a new spreadsheet object --->
<cfset s = spreadsheetNew()>
<!--- Add header row --->
<cfset spreadsheetAddRow(s,"Name,Beers,Vegetables,Fruits,Meats")>
<cfdump var="#s#" />
